sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from ( select a.id,a.tupianmingcheng,a.tupianbianhao,a.changd,a.kuandu, a.fuJian ,a.itime,a.detail,a.deleteFlag from shouyehuandengpian a where 1=1
a.id = #id#
a.tupianmingcheng like '%$tupianmingchengSearch$%'
a.tupianbianhao like '%$tupianbianhaoSearch$%'
a.changd like '%$changdSearch$%'
a.kuandu like '%$kuanduSearch$%'
DATE_FORMAT(a.itime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') >= DATE_FORMAT(#itimeStartSearch#,'%Y-%m-%d %T')
DATE_FORMAT(a.itime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') <= DATE_FORMAT(#itimeEndSearch#,'%Y-%m-%d %T')
a.operatorId = #operatorId#
a.deleteFlag = #deleteFlagSearch#
$dataRight$
order by $orderby$
)table_a

select a.id,a.tupianmingcheng,a.tupianbianhao,a.changd,a.kuandu, a.fuJian ,a.itime, a.detail,a.deleteFlag from shouyehuandengpian a where 1=1
a.id = #id#
a.tupianmingcheng like '%$tupianmingchengSearch$%'
a.tupianbianhao like '%$tupianbianhaoSearch$%'
a.changd like '%$changdSearch$%'
a.kuandu like '%$kuanduSearch$%'
DATE_FORMAT(a.itime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') >= DATE_FORMAT(#itimeStartSearch#,'%Y-%m-%d %T')
DATE_FORMAT(a.itime,'%Y-%m-%d %T') <= DATE_FORMAT(#itimeEndSearch#,'%Y-%m-%d %T')
a.operatorId = #operatorId#
a.deleteFlag = #deleteFlagSearch#
$dataRight$
order by $orderby$
sqlMap.update: insert into shouyehuandengpian (tupianmingcheng,tupianbianhao,changd,kuandu, fuJian ,operatorId,itime,detail) values(#tupianmingcheng#,#tupianbianhao#,#changd#,#kuandu#,#fuJian#,#operatorId#,(select date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S ') from dual),#detail#)

update shouyehuandengpian set tupianmingcheng=#tupianmingcheng#,tupianbianhao=#tupianbianhao#,changd=#changd#,kuandu=#kuandu# ,fuJian=#fuJian# , itime=(select date_format(now(),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S ') from dual),detail=#detail# where id=#id#
update shouyehuandengpian set deleteFlag=#deleteFlag# where id in ( $id$ )
